scripts.release: npm run darwin-x64 && npm run linux-arm64 && npm run linux-x64 && npm run win32-x64 && npm update && npm publish
scripts.darwin-x64: version=$(cat ./package.json | jq -r '.version') && jq '.optionalDependencies["postgrest-dist-darwin-x64"] = "'$version'"' package.json > package.json.tmp && mv package.json.tmp package.json && cd ../darwin-x64 && npm run pre-release && npm publish
scripts.linux-arm64: version=$(cat ./package.json | jq -r '.version') && jq '.optionalDependencies["postgrest-dist-linux-arm64"] = "'$version'"' package.json > package.json.tmp && mv package.json.tmp package.json && cd ../linux-arm64 && npm run pre-release && npm publish
scripts.linux-x64: version=$(cat ./package.json | jq -r '.version') && jq '.optionalDependencies["postgrest-dist-linux-x64"] = "'$version'"' package.json > package.json.tmp && mv package.json.tmp package.json && cd ../linux-x64 && npm run pre-release && npm publish
scripts.win32-x64: version=$(cat ./package.json | jq -r '.version') && jq '.optionalDependencies["postgrest-dist-win32-x64"] = "'$version'"' package.json > package.json.tmp && mv package.json.tmp package.json && cd ../win32-x64 && npm run pre-release && npm publish
